text:
Jennifer Lawrence and Kim Kardashian appeared to get along great during an appearance on TV, but the Academy Award-winner still isn’t entirely sure if Kim would consider her as a friend. The 27-year-old actress claims she has been a fan of the reality series, Keeping Up With The Kardashians, for a long time.

Reportedly, before their appearance together on Jimmy Kimmel Live back in November of 2017, Jen hung out at the Kardashian family home with Kris Jenner and the rest of the clan.

During a speaking event at The Wing, Lawrence said she “doesn’t know” if the reality star would consider her an ally. Lawrence joked it would probably be a “one-sided friendship.”

#jenniferlawrence A post shared by Jennifer Lawrence (@jenniferlawrencepx) on Feb 23, 2018 at 1:35pm PST

Lawrence said she wanted to gather as much information as possible before interviewing Kim on Jimmy’s show and so she sat down and had dinner with the entire family.

J-Law had words of praise for the reality star’s presence which she claimed was “grounded,” “smart,” “normal,” and “funny.” She said they were all “absolutely lovely” to her.

During Kim’s appearance on Jimmy Kimmel Live where Lawrence guest-hosted, the Kardashian sister, and the actress revealed they both got drunk during the dinner.

Lawrence said she remembers getting wasted and naked before demanding Kim to “dress her.” Kim claims Jen wanted West to “style” her and ended up getting completely naked.

Advertisement

Kim said she realized it wouldn’t be a good idea for her husband to come up. Instead, Kim gave her one of her mother’s dresses to wear which she wore throughout the whole dinner.
title: J-Law Says She Doesn’t Know If Kim Kardashian Considers Her A Friend
